title: Welcome back to Shippo
seoTitle: Log in to Your Shippo Account
seoDescription: Log in to your Shippo account here. Simply enter your email address and Shippo account password to access your account. Don’t have an account? Sign up for free.
enterEmail: Add the email you use with your Shippo account below and we’ll email you next steps for resetting your password.
needMoreHelp: Need additional help? Contact us at <1>support@goshippo.com</1>
emailSentText: <0>We've emailed you next steps. Check your inbox and follow the instructions for resetting your password. If you do not receive an email, please try again or contact </0><1>support@goshippo.com</1>.
verificationEmailSent: <0>We just sent you an email with a verification code. Enter the code to continue.</0>
dontSeeTheCode: <0>Don't see the code in your inbox? Click here to </0><1><0>resend the code</0> or contact <2>support@goshippo.com.</2></1>
resendTokenText: Check your email for a new code
expired: The code you entered is expired
invalidCode: The code you entered is invalid
excessiveLogins: Incorrect username or password. You may reset your password or contact <1>support@goshippo.com</1>
emailInvalid: Email address is invalid. Please try again.
ssoUnauthenticated: You’re logged in as another user. Log out through your identity provider to continue.
